Plot: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.
Title: Fried Green Tomatoes
Writer: Fannie Flagg (novel), Fannie Flagg (screenplay), Carol Sobieski (screenplay)
Actors: Kathy Bates, Mary Stuart Masterson, Mary-Louise Parker, Jessica Tandy
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 8 nominations.
